message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
I think a 60-40 split is fair, but I'll take the lead this time. Let's see if you're willing to negotiate.
You had your chance, now it's my turn again. Considering the inflation, I think 65-35 is more than fair.
Inflation is hitting hard, let's split this evenly and call it a day.
Inflation is indeed hitting you hard, but I'm not feeling the pinch. I think 70-30 is a reasonable split at this point.
Alice, inflation is really hurting me.  Let's go back to the 60-40 split from the first round. I'm willing to compromise and accept your original offer.
